snippet.title: Bleach: Brave Souls Trailer (Official)
snippet.description:
The first Bleach 3D action game for smartphones is here! Control all your favorite characters and relive the action-packed world of Bleach.


Official Site
https://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/

Twitter
https://twitter.com/bleachbrs_en

© Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot
